attributes.action: make the post better and safer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I've had it upto my eyeballs with very late post, missing post, and stolen iteams, postmen and woman moan day and night about low pay, they already get to much, I want to know that anything i send or gets sent to me, will turn up ASAP and with out anything being stolen, i want 2 daily posts, and i want them before the normal 2-3pm (how about 7am like it used to be?)

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
